modal.title: Welcome to the Jana Virtual Financial Assistant (JVFA)!
modal.title2: The Jana Virtual Financial Assistant (JVFA) represents a groundbreaking initiative to revolutionize our customer service landscape. Acknowledging the escalating need for seamless and efficient customer interactions, this tool is dedicated to offering 24/7 support, delivering real-time balance information, and facilitating expenditure tracking.
